name: INTUIT, INC. AND AFFILIATES
description: Financial and tax preparation software and related services.
sampleDescriptions: Support FINTECH innovation and consumer protections; promote financial health and literacy for small businesses.

Enhance Tax Administration & tax system integrity; support Tax Simplification and Voluntary Compliance; support IRS Taxpayer Assistance Programs, VITA and Free File; support strengthening anti-cyberfraud protections for tax system and taxpayers. Legislation: H.R.439 - Stolen Identity Refund Fraud Prevention Act of 2017;  HR 3641, The Free File Permanence Act of 2017; H.R. 1, An Act to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018; FY2018 and FY2019 Appropriations.
Promote small business development and growth;  support small business regulatory modernization; support small business and sharing economy financial literacy.
